page.title: 10Youth sub-cultures
page.content: Several sub-cultures exist among {teenagers.}One is based on motor-bikes which are symbols of rebellion.Groups meet on corners and ride in packs. Leather jackets,long hair and a penchant for 'heavy-metal' rock music are characteristics of these{ {'Greasers'}or{'Hell's Angels'.'Mods'} are short-haired scooter riders who wear{'parkas'}(long khaki coats with fur hoods) and enjoy music by special rock bands like{'The Who'&'The Jam'. {'Skinheads} with shaven heads wear frayed denim and heavy{'Doc Marten' boots. A lot of metal studs in clothes and heavy chains as jewellry create a menacing air.{'Punks'}are like a combination of groups with cropped dyed hair.They espouse anarchy, 'squatting' in empty houses and living off state benefits. Adherence is often temporary, shifting and non-violent.
